newsitem.title: USA: Easco Q3 shr loss $0.09 vs profit $0.10.
newsitem.headline: Easco Q3 shr loss $0.09 vs profit $0.10.

text.p: (In thousands, except share and per share data)
Three Months Ended Nine Months Ended

(1) On a pro forma basis, after giving effect to the Company's common stock offering on April 21, 1995 as if it had occurred on January 1, 1995, for the three months ended September 30, 1995 net income and the weighted average number of common shares outstanding would have been unchanged. For the nine months ended September 30, 1995, net income and the weighted average number of common shares outstanding would increase by $250,000 and 679,738, respectively, and net income per common share would decrease by $0.04.

(2) Includes non-cash LIFO income of $715,000, and $1.9 million, for the three and nine months ended September 28, 1996, respectively, and non-cash LIFO expense of $163,000 and $844,000 for the three and nine months ended September 30, 1995, respectively.

(3) Earnings (loss) per share amounts include after tax, non-cash LIFO income of $0.04 and $0.11 per share for the three and nine months ended September 28, 1996, respectively and after tax non-cash LIFO expense of $0.01 and $0.05 for the three and nine months ended September 30, 1995, respectively.
(4) Adjusted EBITDA represents operating profit plus non-cash charges.
